title: Top Floor 3 Bedroom on the Corner! Let Us Take the Work Out of Moving!
map_address: 2355 Mercantile St near Meadows Pkwy and Meadows Blvd
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 23', 'OR Text', '23', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1433 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Talus Flats offers modern apartment homes designed with amenities for a busy lifestyle.', 'The community wraps around two well-appointed courtyards perfect for relaxing.', 'Private parking garages tuck under the building, and open parking areas are spread throughout.', 'Enclosed upscale corridors lead to each luxury 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment home.', 'Inside reveals open-concept living & kitchen spaces filled with white cabinetry, tile backsplashes, and generous natural light.', 'Bedrooms hold abundant storage in roomy walk-in closets, and every apartment contains a full-size washer & dryer.', 'The community will also feature an on-site restaurant with delivery available to our residents.', 'Features:', 'Ceiling Fans, Walk-In Closets, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Carpet, Pet Friendly, Window Coverings, Patio/Balcony, Quartz Countertops, Walk-In Closets, Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Amenities:', 'Recreation Center Passes, Extensive Fitness Center, Gameroom, Walking/Biking Trails, Gas Grills, Community Lounge, Courtyard', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly, and would love to meet your furry family!', 'Contact the leasing office for more information.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'IE9CLI59z98s']
